title: Vegan chocolate cake
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) plain flour', '200g (7 oz) caster sugar', '4 tablespoons cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon distilled white vinegar', '250ml (8 fl oz) water']
